means: 严守时刻的， 准时的，正点的

I have to go now because I must be punctual for class.

sentence.Network_en: He stressed the point that we should be punctual.
sentence.Network_cn: 他强调的一点是我们必须准时.

derivation.yuyuan_name: late 17th cent.: from medieval Latin punctualis, from Latin punctum 'a point'

entry.def: If you are punctual, you do something or arrive somewhere at the right time and are not late.

example.ex: He's always very punctual. I'll see if he's here yet.
example.tran: 他总是很准时。我去看看他是否已经来了。

means.word_mean: 1. acting or arriving or performed exactly at the time appointed;

sentences.sentence: "she expected guests to be punctual at meals"
"he is not a particularly punctual person"

auth_sentence.content: I will be punctual to the minute.
auth_sentence.res_content: I will be punctual to the minute.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: I will be punctual to the minute.

auth_sentence.content: Ah, there you are, Eggerson! Punctual as always.
auth_sentence.res_content: Ah, there you are, Eggerson! Punctual as always.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Ah, there you are, Eggerson! Punctual as always.

stems_affixes.word_buile: punct点,变尖,指,针+ilious→[做事]点滴不漏→小心的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 严守时刻的,准时的,正点的
stems_affixes.word_buile: punct点,变尖,指,针+ual……的→到点上→准点的
pung=punct点,变尖,指,针+ent……的→尖的→尖锐的
acu尖+punct点+ure表名词→用尖[针]点→针炙
com全部+punct点,变尖,指,针+ion表名词→全身像针刺一样→懊悔
punctual[adj.严守时刻的,准时的,正点的]+ity表名词→n.准时
punctuate[v.加标点于;不时打断]+ion表名词→punctuation标点
punct点,变尖,指,针+ure表名词→点[进去]→刺穿
punct点,变尖,指,针+uate=ate表动词→加上点→加标点
punct点,变尖,指,针+ure表名词→点[进去]→刺穿

means.word_mean: 严守时刻的; 准时的; 正点的

sentences.en: I am not myself a particularly punctual person.
sentences.cn: 我本人不是一个严守时间的人。

jushi.chinese: 我本人不是一个严守时间的人。

jushi.english: The cat makes a punctual appearance at mealtimes.
jushi.chinese: 猫总是在喂食时间准时出现。

jushi.english: He is punctual to the minute.
